info.title: Amazon SageMaker Feature Store Runtime
info.description:
Contains all data plane API operations and data types for the Amazon SageMaker Feature Store. Use this API to put, delete, and retrieve (get) features from a feature store.

Use the following operations to configure your OnlineStore and OfflineStore features, and to create and manage feature groups:

  • CreateFeatureGroup

  • DeleteFeatureGroup

  • DescribeFeatureGroup

  • ListFeatureGroups

servers.description: The Amazon SageMaker Feature Store Runtime multi-region endpoint
The Amazon SageMaker Feature Store Runtime multi-region endpoint
The Amazon SageMaker Feature Store Runtime endpoint for China (Beijing) and China (Ningxia)
The Amazon SageMaker Feature Store Runtime endpoint for China (Beijing) and China (Ningxia)

allOf.description: The name of a feature that a feature value corresponds to.
The value associated with a feature, in string format. Note that features types can be String, Integral, or Fractional. This value represents all three types as a string.

items.description: The value associated with a feature.

allOf.description: The record you requested. A list of FeatureValues.
The ExpiresAt ISO string of the requested record.

parameters.name: FeatureGroupName
parameters.description: The name or Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the feature group from which you want to retrieve a record.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The value that corresponds to RecordIdentifier type and uniquely identifies the record in the FeatureGroup.

parameters.name: FeatureName
parameters.description: List of names of Features to be retrieved. If not specified, the latest value for all the Features are returned.

parameters.name: ExpirationTimeResponse
parameters.description: Parameter to request ExpiresAt in response. If Enabled, GetRecord will return the value of ExpiresAt, if it is not null. If Disabled and null, GetRecord will return null.

parameters.name: FeatureGroupName
parameters.description: The name or Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the feature group to delete the record from.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The value for the RecordIdentifier that uniquely identifies the record, in string format.

parameters.name: EventTime
parameters.description: Timestamp indicating when the deletion event occurred. EventTime can be used to query data at a certain point in time.

parameters.name: TargetStores
parameters.description: A list of stores from which you're deleting the record. By default, Feature Store deletes the record from all of the stores that you're using for the FeatureGroup.

parameters.name: DeletionMode
parameters.description: The name of the deletion mode for deleting the record. By default, the deletion mode is set to SoftDelete.

allOf.description: The FeatureGroupName containing Records you retrieved in a batch.
The value of the record identifier in string format.
The name of a feature that a feature value corresponds to.
The value associated with a feature, in string format. Note that features types can be String, Integral, or Fractional. This value represents all three types as a string.

items.description: The output of records that have been retrieved in a batch.

allOf.description: A list of Records you requested to be retrieved in batch.
The name of the feature group that the record belongs to.
The value for the RecordIdentifier in string format of a Record from a FeatureGroup that is causing an error when attempting to be retrieved.
The error code of an error that has occurred when attempting to retrieve a batch of Records. For more information on errors, see Errors.
The error message of an error that has occurred when attempting to retrieve a record in the batch.

items.description: The error that has occurred when attempting to retrieve a batch of Records.

allOf.description: A list of errors that have occurred when retrieving a batch of Records.
The name or Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the FeatureGroup containing the records you are retrieving in a batch.
The value for a list of record identifiers in string format.
List of names of Features to be retrieved. If not specified, the latest value for all the Features are returned.

allOf.description: A unprocessed list of FeatureGroup names, with their corresponding RecordIdentifier value, and Feature name.

allOf.description: TtlDuration time unit.
TtlDuration time value.

TtlDuration.description: Time to live duration, where the record is hard deleted after the expiration time is reached; ExpiresAt = EventTime + TtlDuration. For information on HardDelete, see the DeleteRecord API in the Amazon SageMaker API Reference guide.

allOf.description: The name of a feature that a feature value corresponds to.
The value associated with a feature, in string format. Note that features types can be String, Integral, or Fractional. This value represents all three types as a string.

items.description: The value associated with a feature.

allOf.description:
List of FeatureValues to be inserted. This will be a full over-write. If you only want to update few of the feature values, do the following:

  • Use GetRecord to retrieve the latest record.

  • Update the record returned from GetRecord.

  • Use PutRecord to update feature values.
A list of stores to which you're adding the record. By default, Feature Store adds the record to all of the stores that you're using for the FeatureGroup.
TtlDuration time unit.
TtlDuration time value.

Time to live duration, where the record is hard deleted after the expiration time is reached; ExpiresAt = EventTime + TtlDuration. For information on HardDelete, see the DeleteRecord API in the Amazon SageMaker API Reference guide.

Time to live duration, where the record is hard deleted after the expiration time is reached; ExpiresAt = EventTime + TtlDuration. For information on HardDelete, see the DeleteRecord API in the Amazon SageMaker API Reference guide.
